# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We are committed to providing a secure experience for all users of `QRSay-Mobile-Frontend-CrossPlatform-Scanner`. While we aim to maintain security across all active development branches, our primary focus for security updates is on the latest stable release.

| Version | Supported          |
|---------|--------------------|
| Latest  | :white_check_mark: |
| Older   | :x:                |
